Heamo Smart Gold

"The Best Solution to check Heamoglobin levels in blood"

Why Heamo Smart Gold?

Heamoglobin which is commonly called "Hb" is a crucial test which can give you information about quality of your Blood Old method of measuring hb% were difficuilt and not enough accurate. Even now some people are using these methods but such methods are now Out of Date. With advance in medical technology it is possible to get hb results in very easy way with highest possible accuracy Heamo Smart Gold meter is a very Advance Device to help you measure your heamoglobin levels alongside Hct

Benfits of Heamo Smart Gold

1.High quality product with new standards of ease and accuracy in the field of positive health care
2.Small Sample Volume
3.Splash Proof
4.Strip Ejection
5.Hgb/Hct
6.Quick Testing Time
